spanGrp.span: Our people are in a good relationship with Georgians.
bizım halh gürjülärda gürjülärınanda yahšiih dapustim gürjülärınanda
Our people speak the same language.
bizım halh bir bi bir dildä söilierıh
We speak Georgian and Russian as well.
Many of our people speak Armenian too.
We can say that Georgians can speak only Georgian and maybe Russian.
ama gürjülär dapustim bir gürji gürjüjä bülier možet birdä urusča bülälär bülmiälär bazra
Old people speak but young people don’t speak.
Well people and our customs are almost the same.
sora ištem halh nä ädätımız pačti birdır
Georgians are not bad people, they are good people as are our people.
köti halh dägıllär gürjülärdä yahši halhtırlar onnarda bizım halhta yahši
